education_text.0: Postel attended      Van Nuys High School Van Nuys High School,          and then      redirect    UCLA where he earned his BPostel started work at UCLA on 23 December 1969 as a Postgraduate Research Engineer (I) where he was involved in early work on the      ARPANETAll of the above were time activities he assumed in conjunction with his primary position as Director of the Computer Networks Division, Division 7, of the Information Sciences Institute at the University of Southern CaliforniaThe Postel Center at      Information Sciences Institute Information Sciences Institute,      University of Southern California University of Southern California, is named in his honor, as is the annual      redirect    Postel Award Postel Award
